resources.string: Preheat a non stick frying pan. Add butter and melt it around the pan. Place the flour in a small mixing bowl. Make a well in the center and add the egg.Stir together a little bit and start adding the milk slowly until well combined. Add the maple syrup into the butter and stir. Pour butter in a jug and then pour the butter into the frying pan.Tilt the frying pan to spread the butter. Once bubbles form on the top, flip the pancake over.Repeat with remaining butter. Serve with toppings of choice.
Home of Tasty,Quality and Affordable Foods
KitchenYetu is your kitchen away from your home-kitchen.
salt and ground black pepper to taste

Heat olive oil in a large sauce pan over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until the onion in translucent,5 to 7 minutes. Sit tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, wine, tomato paste, chicken buillon granules, basil, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper with the onion mixture to a boil, reduce heat to low, and cook at a simmer, stirring frequently for one hour.ENJOY!
